Tennis Program
more about boca bath & tennis!
PICKLEBALL
Playing pickleball allows you to work on your balance, agility, reflexes, and hand-eye coordination without putting excessive strains on your body! Our outdoor court offers opportunities to challenge your neighbors, hone your skills, or warm-up for an upcoming tennis match.  The latest and most fun new sport around!
FOR THE KIDS
Giant ficus and leafy oak trees shade our state-of-the-art
playground, jungle gym, slides and swing set
. Playtime is another thing we're serious about here. Kids will love to meet friends, run, jump, climb, slide, and enjoy carefree play in this delightful environment.
BASKETBALL
BEAUTIFUL PARKS
BASKETBALL
Our
outdoor basketball court
is ideal for players of any age and any skill level. There are six hoops that adjust in height, with a regulation high school court and two smaller side courts that are properly lined for three-point shooting and games.
VOLLEYBALL
BEAUTIFUL PARKS
BASKETBALL
What could be more fun than a game of beach volleyball? Alongside the basketball court is our beach volleyball court with white sand surface and regulation net. This offers another fun option for our community members and their guests to get a great workout and connect.
BEAUTIFUL PARKS
BEAUTIFUL PARKS
BEAUTIFUL PARKS
Set on 163 acres, Boca Bath & Tennis offers residents and their guests year-round access to shaded, tree-lined streets that meander through our cozy neighborhood of open grassy common areas and eight expansive parks with three lakes.
